title: When I press the power button, the screenshot option is missing, and not sure which settings fix it
content: Trying to take a screenshot, but it's not listed as an option, also the options moved from the right side of the screen to the top when I didn't change my settings (there was an update from Google two days ago, though). I've gone into every setting, turning the screenshot option off then on again, as well as restarting my phone ... I would take a screenshot to show what it looks like, but ... I literally can't
